name: snAIk
description:
Ever felt like playing snake with friends, but then remembered that you had none? Don't worry, snAIk can provide you a slithery pal to eat your fruits with!

Just remember not to let him touch you. Don't ask.

How To Play:

Use the arrow keys / A & D / the joystick to turn the darker snake left and right. Collect fruit to grow both you and your lighter AI partner and increase your score. Don't let yourself and the AI collide, or get too far away from each other.

Contrary to traditional snake, you can pass over yourself since this just complements this gameplay better. If I choose to update in future, I plan to add a 'classic mode' with 90* turning and self-collision.
